class.name: CFFILibraryHandle
class.brief_description: Native dynamic library handle, where native functions live.

method.name: get_function
method.description: Get the function named [param name] from the library. [param name] should be a symbol exported by the native library. Users are responsible for passing the correct return type and array of argument types. Types may be either [CFFIType] or a String, for example [code]"int"[/code] or [code]"const char *"[/code]. [b]Warning:[/b] passing the wrong types and calling the returned function may crash your application and/or Godot editor.

method.name: get_global
method.description: Get a pointer to the global variable named [param name] from the library. [param name] should be a symbol exported by the native library. Users are responsible for passing the correct type. Types may be either [CFFIType] or a String, for example [code]"int"[/code] or [code]"const char *"[/code]. [b]Warning:[/b] Passing the wrong type and dereferencing the returned pointer may crash your application and/or Godot editor.
